name: Zombie Die Hard
description:
Download and Play our new "FREE" game - "Zombie Die Hard” on Google Play!

Zombie Die Hard (Free Game) is a First Person Shooter game. It's a zombie killing action game with lots of guns to upgrade like shotguns, assault rifles, machine guns, sniper guns and many more. You get in-game weapons like time bombs, grenades and c4 to explode the zombies.

Play the game in three modes - easy, normal and hard. Achieve and unlock new achievements after each level. Unlock bonus points for headshots. Beware of the dead city zombies and animals attacking you!

Reclaim your lost city! Get ready for the action!

Awesome Features:

*UPGRADE new weapons in deadly modern combat.
*Kill different kinds of zombies.
*New and unique bonus achievements.
*Addictive game play with ultra smooth controls.
*Google Play Game Services integrated for leader boards and achievements.
*Share on Facebook and Google Plus to compete with your friends.
*Special health bonus and in-game ammunitions.
*It's a FREE game!

How to Play:

Touch right below button to fire.
Touch the upper button to reload your weapon.

Check out our free games previews, game trailers, videos and more free apps in the future.
